Testing out pulling SOTA data...


```{ojs}
d3 = require('d3')

activations = await d3.json(
  "https://api-db.sota.org.uk/admin/activator_log_by_id?year=all&id=46844"
)

  data = activations.map(d => ({
    ActivationDate: new Date(d.ActivationDate),
    Total: +d.Total
  }));
```
